meanings.definition: A board or panel listing the names of the leaders in a competition.
meanings.sent1: The school's leaderboard displayed the top students' names.
meanings.sent2: I checked the leaderboard to see who was winning the race.
meanings.sent3: The leaderboard at the spelling bee had everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, she aimed to reach the top of the leaderboard.
meanings.sent5: The leaderboard was like a map guiding us to success.

meanings.definition: A digital display showing the current rankings in a competition.
meanings.sent1: The online leaderboard updated in real-time.
meanings.sent2: Players eagerly awaited the leaderboard results.
meanings.sent3: The malfunctioning leaderboard showed funny symbols instead of names.
meanings.sent4: Her progress on the leaderboard was a digital badge of honor.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors on the leaderboard made it easy to read.
